name: The KUKI BETA 1.1
description:
A game to play with friends, get score, do 1 v 1's, and play co-op vs enemies. There might be a lot of bugs, please report all of them.

Player 1 Controls:

UP ARROW - UP

DOWN ARROW - DOWN

LEFT ARROW - LEFT

RIGHT ARROW - RIGHT 

RCTRL - SHOOT

Player 2 Controls:

W - UP

S - DOWN

A - LEFT

D - RIGHT 

SPACE - SHOOT
